attributes.review: This app is the worst app Iâ€™ve ever downloaded in my life. Ever since I got it, my phone has been acting glitchy and weird. The battery drains crazily fast, my other apps stopped working, my phone randomly shuts off, and it takes up so much data. Not to mention the app itself runs super slow and has so many bugs. I strongly suggest that whoever made this app deletes it because this is utter trash. The design is also incredibly ugly and unappealing, and the layout is so consuming to navigate. 11/10 would not recommend.
